replies.body:
Kaspersky Internet Security doesn't like your links, Riot.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
kai'sa model ( Í¡Â° ÍœÊ– Í¡Â°)
Hey all- asking about the issues some are having with the texture files. Since it's a weekend we might be slow to update. Thanks for the patience!
i hate to rush as this is already generous, but is there gonna be updated links with textures?
From "incase" to misplaced capitalization to extra/missing commas to failed parallel construction, that text is full of mistakes. Maybe Riot should outsource their writing, too.

Thanks for the heads up! I've taken a pass and all the grammar issues should now be fixed. If you see any other issues, feel free to let me know. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Okay, but do tell me why you made Galio smaller than his splash art or short story? Everything felt perfect except for that looking at the artwork presented.

Tldr: things that work in 2D art in a splash don't always translate well to cinematics. Same reason why a champion in a splash art might have a smaller sword than in game. Different mediums need different things
But canonically, he is still much bigger than how he appeared in the cinematic right?
To be honest, I like his size in the cinematic more.

Can i ask a question on why they are making more human champions instead of more inhuman characters, make more robot's, maybe more void characters, or make something new and that is not more human than fun (if you know what i mean). i'm just kinda annoyed by these human characters! I don't know about you guys, but there is **TOO MEANY** human like characters.
I agree Human characters are to boring i want Like some monster or maybe a Dragon/Wyvern or something like a leviathan
They simply sell better.  Despite what you personally think of them, human champions are generally more popular and sell more skins.

Are you planning on adding the textures as well?

These are awesome, but 3DS Max is giving me an error saying that it can't locate the textures for the characters and weapons, and it doesn't look like there are any in the files.
It should be included in the zip file... It works on my end... ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”
It definitely doesn't work: https://imgur.com/a/Bdu83Dq
I dont think they are included
I can vouch it doesn't work as well.
What software would be best for viewing these... and possibly interacting with them if they are rigged?

* Autodesk 3ds Max
* V-Ray for 3ds Max
It says "Your connection is not private," and I am unable to view the files :( Any tips? {{sticker:sg-janna}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:cass-cry}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
There should be button **[Advanced]** - click on it. After that, text **Proceed to *RiotWebsite*** will appear.
No textures yet?

Still no textures? :(

Edit: apparently theyre coming soon https://twitter.com/Riotswimbananas/status/1227299166574895104
Still no textures {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Hello there, friend, there's a new page with the textures as a separate link now! Enjoy! https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/news/community/warriors-cinematic-season-2020-asset-pack/
Aaaaaand they're gone... -_-
Riot please please please release the textures for these. There is no point in us only having the models with no texture...

Riot, the files yesterday had the textures included as links separate from the model files, but today they're gone. I was able to download the item textures but not the character textures. Any way to reupload those?

There was even the castle environment, like 14 gigs of it but I didn't get to download it :(
Man I really hope it does get reuploaded. Theres no point having these models without the textures on them.
Can't find seem to be able to find where to download them, are they still available?
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/news/community/warriors-cinematic-season-2020-asset-pack/

I want to cosplay Frejlord Sylas, so the files are super helpful! They are way better than any of the screenshots from the cinematic. However I still can't see the full back detail of the hood on any of the jpeg files. Also, I am still confused on the chains. Are they a diamond or a hexagon? The concept art shows diamonds, but the cinematic appears to show hexagons...
{{sticker:katarina-love}}

I'm hype that you are going to use it! This is one of those cases where you mighty just need to make a call on which shape of the chains you think is more interesting. As for the hood, download the 3D turn arounds, and look at the face close up shot. That's going to give you the best view
Any updates on the missing textures? Even the download page is gone, will it be back up?

Are these files rigged? I have no experience rigging models with such high quality, so I was just curious.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Download them and find out, otherwise you should be able to rig them yourself if it lets you use them in blender/unity (rigging models isnt neccessarily hard, just time consuming)

Why isn't there just a download all button? Or a zip of everything instead of having to download each thing individually?
P.S. I also have no textures.
Yo riot, the tear of the goddess in the cinematic was floating similar to how the world runes did in the Ryze cinematic. So does this similarity mean that tear of the goddess is a world rune?
Can we please get those textures back? You are aware that these models without textures or UV maps are kinda useless...
I feel like they are not allowed to share the textures? :(
There's no link to Sylas chains. It downloads Sylas model and main char Sylas link isnt working.
Just wait til the VR Chat community gets ahold of these... they'll be giving the models (especially Kai'sa) things they don't need
When is Aatrox going to be in the next cine? And why is he using his 7ft sword like a 2ft dagger in game?? Fix this or make kayle melee perm.

Riot doesn't just support the fans... They fuel the fans
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Would it be possible to get the files in a format that can be opened in softwares other than 3ds max? Even a .3ds file would be fine since at least that could be converted. Any file format that includes the textures, as right now the files require some very expensive software to use effectively and exporting the files to a more universal file type would be very easy on your end.
thank you for this
thank you! <3 pretty amazing that you're doing this
